bibl.title: Deux papyrus latins relatifs à l'administration financière de l'Égypte.
bibl.note: 1. P. Oxy. XII, 1511 = Ch.L.A. IV, 265. Register of Correspondence received by 'tabularii.' Before 247 A.D. - 2. P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.class. c. 54 (et non 64) R. Recto inédit de P. Oxy. III, 454 = Ch.L.A. IV, 264. Register of payments received by an office of the central administration of Egypt. Post 111 A.D.
bibl.seg: 145.5 P. Oxy. III, 454 recto = Ch.L.A. IV, 264 P. Oxy. XII, 1511 = Ch.L.A. IV, 265
Marichal Robert, Deux papyrus latins relatifs à l'administration financière de l'Égypte.

1. P. Oxy. XII, 1511 = Ch.L.A. IV, 265. Register of Correspondence received by 'tabularii.' Before 247 A.D. - 2. P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.class. c. 54 (et non 64) R. Recto inédit de P. Oxy. III, 454 = Ch.L.A. IV, 264. Register of payments received by an office of the central administration of Egypt. Post 111 A.D.
